banner.title: AZAMAZA
banner.subtitle: Ukraine's First Subscription Marketplace-Discounter!
banner.description1: Products and services at real wholesale prices - retail!
banner.description2: Special offer for the first 100,000 users. Promotional access from just 199 UAH per year.

aboutSection.title: About Us
aboutSection.subtitle: Millions of products with maximum discounts + thousands of various services directly from performers, without commissions, intermediaries and additional costs
aboutSection.description: A service that provides maximum discounts on services and products. Tours, photo sessions, restaurants, marketplace, rentals, hotel bookings, transfers, gifts — all in one place
aboutSection.summary: Order, rent, buy on the marketplace without unnecessary apps and transitions to third-party resources. A single account for managing all services

benefits.benefit1: Promotional subscription for the first 100,000 users - join Azamaza and get all services forever
benefits.benefit2: Investment in the future. One payment. Only 199 hryvnias for unlimited access to the «all-in-one» platform
benefits.benefit3: Hurry up and join. Limited presale offer valid for the first 100,000 subscribers. Don't overpay later, save now!

services.service1: Everything you were looking for! Discounts up to 70% on any product on our marketplace
services.service2: The best hotels — at a special price only for subscribers
services.service3: Dinner at a restaurant with up to 50% discount with our service
services.service4: Thousands of tours at special prices for platform subscribers
services.service5: Rent a car, order a taxi - much cheaper with a subscription
services.service6: Meet, travel, relax — subscription opens access to events and new acquaintances
services.service7: Savings on every kilometer — discounts at gas stations throughout Europe and Ukraine
services.service8: The best photographers — at the lowest price, but only for our members
services.service9: Win iPhones, tablets, trips and other valuable prizes
services.finalNote: Azamaza - not just a platform. It's a service that makes it easy to buy, travel, meet people, get new opportunities and enjoy life

howItWorks.intro: With Azamaza you buy not just a subscription, but convenience and savings. Subscription gives you access to the most diverse services on the most favorable terms, as well as the ability to buy goods without retail markup and additional costs
howItWorks.step1: You purchase a subscription from 199₴ and become one of 100,000 lucky ones who will get priority access to the platform, its features and unique benefits
howItWorks.step2: Project launch - beginning of 2026. Each participant will receive unlimited access to all services, offerings and proposals without restrictions and additional costs until January 1, 2027
howItWorks.step3: Everyone who purchases an early access subscription is guaranteed to become participants in a super raffle of valuable prizes (iPhones, tablets, TVs, etc.) from the Azamaza platform!

subscriptionBenefits.benefit1Description: By becoming a participant at the launch stage, you get access to everything:
subscriptionBenefits.benefit2Description: Every early access subscriber automatically participates in the raffle of valuable and unique prizes from Azamaza:
subscriptionBenefits.benefit2Item3: Unexpected bonuses that will pleasantly surprise
subscriptionBenefits.benefit3Description: now you can lock in the most favorable price at the start — without risks and overpayments

subscriptionBenefits.benefit4Item3: Smart subscription that pays for itself from the first order
subscriptionBenefits.benefit5Description: Buy a subscription now — means win more:
subscriptionBenefits.benefit5Item3: More opportunities to become part of a great project from the very start

lite.description: For those who want to try the service with minimal costs
lite.feature1: Access to verified services (restaurants, hotels, tours, etc.)
lite.feature2: Up to 5 items/orders with discount per month

pro.description: The most optimal solution! This package maximizes possibilities
pro.feature1: Unlimited orders in all service categories

elite.description: For those who want the best and are ready to pay maximum for VIP platform
